name: It's just a ball game, man!
name_original: It's just a ball game, man!
description:
Oh no aliens from outer space have attacked a fruit truck and its contents are spilling into the pool!

Use your trusty paddle ball to catch all of the fruit and aliens before they touch the water. But beware if your ball gets submerged you lose point, so try to stay on top of things and get the high score.

Made by a team of 6 people as part of the GMTK Jam 2021!

Credits:

Philipp Stenger - Game Design and Programming

Marvin Spahn - Tech Art and Music

Marco Serrao - VFX

Thomas Bauer - Environment Art

Nora Al-Shamery - UI and Title Screen

János Weyhknecht - Props and Sound Effects
